HTMLDialogElementOpen.summary:
The open property of the
interface is a boolean value reflecting the
open HTML attribute, indicating whether the dialog is
available for interaction.

remarks.para: -The HTML element implementing this interface: dialog.

HTMLDialogElementOpen.value:
A boolean value representing the state of the open HTML attribute. true means it is set, and therefore the dialog
is shown. false means it not set, and therefore the dialog is not shown.The property is not read only â€” it is possible to set the value to programmatically
show or hide the dialog.
